title: 1 Bedroom efficiency Available ASAP
map_address: 1302 E Broadway near Dixie Farm Rd.
posting_body: We are located near the Brookside Village district of Pearland , our friendly community has everything you need to enjoy the amenities of city life along with the benefits of suburban living.
When you live here, you’re part of a small-town setting where neighbors know each other by name.
Ready to make the move to our newly renovated community?
Discover how good life can be when you live at Royal Oaks of Pearland!
Royal Oaks Of Pearland has some AMAZING rates on 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for immediate move-in.
Contact our leasing office for more information.
We're are happy to answer any questions, send pricing/info, or to set up an appointment to tour your new home!!
Pet friendly up to 20 pounds (no aggressive breeds or puppies)
Contact one of our friendly staff members today!
